review.comment: Called to make an appointment and it's all about the $$. First of all he's super expensive but they don't want to know anything about you, they want a CC right away so they can charge you if you don't follow their cancellation policy.

I was not very impressed with Dr. Eric. I don’t think he has great people skills. The whole time I was in the office I felt like I was not very welcomed by the receptionist or him. I saw him twice and both times I felt like he didn’t really care about what we were talking about. I don’t recommend anyone going here for their first visit.
My son was 5 years old when he was diagnosed with  brain cancer. He’s 7 today and doing well. Dr merdov is no question a big part of how well my son is doing now. 6 star rating.

I want to shout from the roof tops how great I'm feeling and I owe it all to Dr Eric Muradov. I've been struggling with extreme fatigue and at my wits end not getting any resolution no matter where I turned. Then I met Dr. Muradov and right from my first appointment he felt optimistic he could help me, and he did!  So please don't hesitate and go see him.
Eric Muradov is a quack. I went to him and he took my money and I got nothing but pain and suffering at the hands of this man. Avoid him and his practices. Total bull.

Dr Muradov is very thorough, Kind and a great listener. He provided me a simple plan and gave me options with how  I would like to proceed. I was struggling with PMS ans skin issues for nearly 10  years and Dr Muradov was able to find a solution so I can continue  life at ease. I also appreciate the long term plan is to not stay on supplements for the rest of my life.  I could not be happier with his service and of course Jackie was  a huge help with the process too . Thank you
How this person is allowed to run a business is a mystery. Dr. Muradov was rude, unprofessional and unprepared

I came to see Dr. Eric twice. The first meeting went well, however on the second meeting he fell asleep at his desk while showing me something on his computer screen. After about 10 minutes of him not waking up I told the person at the front. She panicked and called 911. I guess not everything can me cured with natural medicine. Hope he is ok
Overpriced and nothing he reconsidered wormed. He also didn’t really seem to care
Save your money. This guy had no idea what he was doing or talking about until it came to the bill. When it came to billing and overcharging this guy was on his game

Dr. Muradov is one of the best NDs I’ve worked with. I’ve seen 2 NDs in the past and I must say I’m so happy I found Dr. M. He is helping me get to a better place with my complex health concerns. I have faith and trust in his capabilities. I’m fully on board with the direction that we are going in and look forward to continuing to seek his medical expertise. I would recommend Dr. M to anyone looking for a knowledgeable and resourceful naturopathic doctor. Your health is so important, so if something doesn’t feel right don’t even think twice. Pick up the phone and do something for YOU!

Hi, One day my husband came home and said: "You should book an appointment at this clinic with Dr. Muradov" This was my last resort, I've tried everything, I mean everything, I have been struggling with autoimmune issues, Hashimoto Thyroid, Osteoarthritis, Pancreatitis, Chronic Fatigue and could barely function in my busy day, for years and years, about 10 years of no family life, at my job I couldn't face the stress and so on....When I started the treatment Dr. Muradov prescribed to me I slowly started to feel better, energy levels increased, blood work looked better, stomach pain slowly decreased and I can't say enough how happy I am with the results, I have my life back again. For years I didn't know what is to function normally. My family noticed how much improvement it's made on my life...and now I can enjoy my life again. Thank you Dr. Muradov

Hi, This was my last resort to feeling myself again, i have been struggling with autoimmune issues and could barely function in my busy day. When i started coming for treatment i slowly built up my levels again and i can't say enough how happy i am with the results, i have energy, and FUN again... i forgot what it was like to function normally. I call it my Wonder woman secret juice HA!.  My kids even noticed how much improvement its made on my life because it affects the loved ones we are around too.

I should have gone to see him years ago when my thyroid was first dysfunctional.

I just recently seen him. He made me feel heard.

He explained that vitamin b12 is really good for depression and bipolar.  So I've been getting the shots.

I feel better. I'm looking forward to getting progress with my weight loss. Only 50 more pounds to go.
Great experience getting IV therapy.

I am totally blown away by the amazing compassion, patience, and knowledge Dr. Eric Muradov and staff display every visit towards myself, and multiple other family, relatives, and friends I have referred to his clinic (and will continually refer). He gets it. How to treat disease, and how to "treat" patients.. because he is a patient himself and knows the other side. His approach is very balanced, reasonable, and effective. Absolutely the best ND I have had the pleasure to take me as a patient!
So glad i came across Dr. Muradov! He is a great listener and got right down to the bottom of my issues. I would highly recommend him as he is a true professional and an expert in his field.
I was very please with the service and advice I received from Mr. Muradov. Him and his staff are friendly and truly seem to care about your issues.  Highly recommended.

Dr Muradov is very knowledgeable and genuinely concerned about you. He takes his time to listen and then comes up with a detailed treatment plan that will work.   I would highly recommend Dr. Muradov...Love him!
I am having best experience every time.
I had an excellent experience!

Dr. Muradov is great! He is empathetic and very knowledgable. He listens to each of your concerns and does his best to address them. He actually cares and does not ignore issues like some of my MDs have in the past. I would 100% recommend Dr. Muradov to anyone!
Great all around view of ones health needs. Has assisted me greatly in attaining and maintaining a better me
Amazing. Made my quality of life 10 times better!!

After many years of being frustrated with not finding solutions to fatigue through traditional methods, I found Dr. Muradov. Although the journey was a bit longer than Dr. Muradov had expected, he did not give up on finding solutions and consequently, he provided me with solutions for fatigue as well as support through the ugly menopause stages.  Although this route is not inexpensive, I am very fortunate to have found Dr. Muradov and his support staff Jackie. Dr. Muradov was great with communicating with me via email so to save me a few office visits.  I am sad that our current healthcare system does not support Naturopaths and our additional health insurance programs are also very insufficient. This form of healthcare is so much more supportive and preventative than our traditional form of healthcare in yet our system sees them as less inferior. How many more people could be living healthier lives without depending on endless medications if they could only access this form of healthcare?

I visited Dr. Muradov after a couple of years trying to figure out what was wrong with me. My GP finally narrowed the issue down to Fibromyalgia, which felt a little like a blanket term for the issues I was having, and the medication with helps with neuropathic pain, as only a bandaid, being that it's effectiveness decreased within months of starting it. Even during the first visit, Dr. Muradov was able to give me some pointers about typical presentations of fibro- like sluggish mitochondria, which isn't something I had even been able to find in my own online searching for answers. By the second appointment, my pain had virtually gone, my good days far outnumbered my bad days. I've been doing vitamin and magnesium IV's and I feel great! Dr. Muradov helped me to avoid costly testing, while helping me to get relief from the pain. I've not felt this good in literally years. I do plan to do some comprehensive testing AHS can't do (which Dr. Muradov doesn't profit from, btw, as it is outsourced direct) eventually, but in the meantime, I am feeling so much better. I don't have coverage for ND Healthcare, so it is out of pocket for me, and I am a single income earner in my own home, however, I have to say that it is totally reasonable for the benefit I have received! I paid $200 a month for 6 or 8 month for an injectable drug my GP prescribed me to help with some of the issues I was having which didn't work at all, and only made me feel sicker, and I learned it has a black diamond warning meaning in lab tests in rats it shows to give them thyroid cancer!!! It didn't even have human trials, I don't think-only rat trials! They told me not to worry because that warning is for high, long term sustained doses 🙄 anyway, Dr. Muradov has helped me, and all by natural means! I am a big big fan of Dr. Muradov and his wonderful staff and clinic. I highly recommend. I think Dr. Muradov has a much more comprehensive and wholistic knowledge that you are unlikely to find in a GP

As a 40 year old female I was struggling with failing energy that was progressing and consequently impacted my quality of life. Dr. Muradov analyzed the underlying causes through bloodwork and recommended supplements that literally changed my ability to function on a daily basis. They worked immediately.

After months and months of trying and failing to get back to my good health with my family doctor I could not give up and had to look for other options, just like you’re doing. Don’t let up, use all the tools available to you. You may even have an allowance under your employer provided health care benefits for these visits. Take advantage of them!

You are your own best advocate for your health.

It wasn’t through word of mouth that I was able to find this fantastic resource, but other great reviews from patients that encouraged me to visit. So it only makes sense to me that I would reaffirm those positive experiences.
Great doctor. Highly knowledgeable and kind. First doctor that was listening my health problems and finding reason for it. Far better then any other doctor I went to. He actually cares.

When my doctor wouldn't listen, Dr. Muradov did. He fixed my Iron levels and my Menorrhagia issues that my 'doctor' said were normal and lots of women dealt with. It isn't, and I'm glad I found him. Energy is back, no longer many PMS symptoms and I can function again. Highly recommended.

I have Trigeminal Neuralgia and thyriod problems. I have seen Dr. Muradov now 2 times. We are not there yet, but i sure feel way better than I have in years. Doing the right test, I am so glad to have found him.

I actually tried calling the clinic a year ago to go in for an assessment but didn't get a call back. It was during the Christmas season so I figured they were too busy and/or were on holidays and my voicemail may have gotten lost in the shuffle. My digestion issues became so unbearable that I decided to try calling his office again during the summer and MAN am I glad I did! Dr. Muradov was the first doctor that actually LISTENED to my complaints and tried to come up with the correct diagnosis, instead of trying to prescribe me antacids or some other nonsense medication. For the first time in more than 20 years, I can truly say that my stomach has remained pain free for weeks!! It's amazing how spot on his diagnosis and subsequent treatment was. Although it has been an expensive and disciplined journey (because my issues are THAT bad) it is well worth it and I would do it all over again in a heartbeat! You only have one life to live so take care of it the best you can! Thank goodness I found Dr. Muradov. It's such a relief to be pain free!

I really don't like to leave bad reviews, but, unfortunately our experience with Muradov was not good. He either has very poor people skills or really doesn't care about people. He did not introduce himself at either visit and was cold and unfriendly. He spent most of the time looking at his screen and made very little eye contact.
Also, despite perscribing expensive tests and tons of pills, nothing he's suggested has worked well. The only advice that's worked was from our MD.  Though it's not a great option neither is tons of natural remedies and tests that don't work.
Don't waste your money here like we did.

Dr. Deol is an outstanding ND. She is thorough and leaves you feeling confident with her recommendations. The changes she suggested for my diet and routines helped me to start feeling better. She's very personable and makes one feel fairly comfortable. I highly recommend Dr. Deol to anyone. 5 stars!

I had more then a few sessions with Dr Muradov and from our first orientations he was attentive and detailed I really liked that. A doctor needs to be able to listen as well as diagnose properly. In any case I started seeing strong improvements on a few of my issues (muscle tension & back pain which led to all types of other issues). it was very evident that he is well rounded in his knowledge and experience in all sorts of medicine and healing. Its nice to know he is there to help so I highly recommend Dr Muradov and I hope he can help you too.

I just started going to the clinic 2 weeks ago and after 2 IV vitamin treatments I feel amazing. Fatigue decreased, concentration improved and overall great feeling of well being.   I can’t wait to work through some other issues and start to feel even better!
I had a great experience with Dr. Muradov! There was some testing that did cost money however through that testing he was really able to help me!

Dr. Eric is very knowledgeable,easy to understand his explanations regarding health issues. Myself and my husband get our IV vitamin cocktail every month wich help us to enjoy fully our lives in early 50s. We try to be proactive instead reactive with our health.

My experience with Dr. Muradov has been excellent. I've seen other naturopaths who have failed to take my symptoms seriously and have treated them in a willy nilly fashion, causing me to spend hundreds on supplements that never helped. I've struggled with adrenal fatigue for years and, after doing some testing, Dr. Muradov created a proactive/strategic approach for treating it and my underactive thyroid. When we weren't getting the results we wanted, he didn't hesitate to try a more aggressive treatment approach using hydrocortisone and dessicated thyroid, which has finally made a huge difference in boosting my energy and regulating my circadian rhythms.  Dr. Muradov is committed to seeing results and will persist until he does. Unlike other naturopaths, he doesn't just give up when one course of treatment doesn't work. He trusts what his patients are telling him about their symptoms, even when it means he has to start over or go in a different direction. From our very first visit, I had hope for the first time in years that I could finally get better and had every confidence that he would find the solution to my problem, which he has.

Dr Muradov, great doctor, POOR service at reception. I went to see Dr Muradov for a few different ailments. Dr Muradov was thorough, patient, and determined to work with me to find solutions. I felt as though he found the solution to my energy level and helped me to recover from my chronic fatigue. That said, I stopped going to see him namely due to the lack of service from his receptionist. On my initial visits Dr Muradov asked me to try Estrovera, they were out at that time so the receptionist said she would put in an order and call me when the order arrived, a few days she said. There was no call. I called twice on my own to check the status of this order and neither of my voicemails was returned. I brought this up with Dr Muradov and he simply commented that this was strange. However, I found this to be consistent. When Dr Muradov went on vacation he indicated to me that his receptionist would still be checking voicemails and returning calls while he was away. Again, I made at least two calls to book a meeting, only to have neither of them returned. I was finally able to reach someone after Dr Muradov returned from vacation.  I feel I could give Dr Muradov 5 stars if her were to address the issue of his reception.

I have seen a big difference in my health through my interactions with Dr Muradov. What sets Dr. Muradov apart from your traditional doctor is the time he takes to understand what your concerns are and coming up with a plan to address the root cause through alternative means. He tailors his approach to suit you. Dr Muradov is highly knowledgeable and excellent at explaining all the treatments in detail so you know exactly what you need to do.
Dr. Muradov has helped me numerous times over the past few years and continues to be my primary source of reliable health advice. He is always well informed when it comes to cutting edge therapies.

I was a patient of Dr. Muradov's since last year October. He helped me with my thyroid issues - lack of energy etc. I found his services to be great and he was very attentive and listened to my concerns. However, the same cannot be said for his reception/office staff. It is nearly impossible to reach the receptionist - the phone calls are hardly ever answered - my voicemails have NEVER been returned. As a result, I have had difficulty in making/cancelling appointments - or reaching the doctor. At one point I had to email Dr. Muradov directly to try and cancel an appointment upon which I finally received a call from his receptionist - she said the best way to reach her was via email. Since then I have tried to email - same thing - no response. I was also very disappointed recently when I contacted Dr. Muradov directly to re-fill my thyroid medication. I contacted him WEEKS in advance of running out - because the last time I ran out and had a very difficult time getting a hold of him to refill my prescription. So this time I thought to contact him ahead of time. He responded to my email regarding the refill - but I never got a call from the pharmacy that my prescription was filled - nor did I ever hear back from Dr. Muradov. It's been over a month and a half since I contacted him for a refill and still haven't heard back. I have decided to switch to a different Doctor who is more readily available and can be reached easily.

I've been suffering from chronic fatigue, joint stiffness and weight gain for the past five years. Doctors in both BC and Alberta were unable or unwilling to work with me to find a reason. Dr. Muradov was the first one to ask the right questions and work WITH me to find the answers. He is open to trying cost-effective treatments and tweaking them as needed. I'm so grateful to have finally found a doctor who takes my health seriously!

I came to see Dr Muradov after no one could explain why I was so sick and not recovering. After twenty some different doctors, Dr Muradov figured out what the problem was and knew how to direct me to find answers and help. I appreciate his out of the box thinking and genuine concern.
Excellent Practitioner.
Dr Muradov is incredibly knowledgable, answered all my questions. My conditions had been addressed and I've been seeing results. Highly recommend!
